constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 215 (Tuesday, December 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MOULTON:
H.R. 6295.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I; Section 8, Clause 4 and 18 of the United States
Constitution.
[Page H7825]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: For the relief of Maria Merida de Macario and Firelly Airlen Rios Cano.
